Text: Farewelltime to say farewell Next Thursday will be my last day at Enron as I will be leaving to pursue other opportunities Over the years I appreciated the opportunity to work with to learn from and get to know all of you and hope we can stay in touch my email address is I hope those in Houston can join me at Soleros after work on Thursday Sept Deffners buying Take care Matt
